name: Nightcross Fast Attack Package
desc: Enables heavy industry to construct the more common ship hulls, weapons, and fighter LPCs associated with Nightcross Armory Fast Attack doctrine.

name: Nightcross Heavy Support Package
desc: Enables heavy industry to construct the more common ship hulls, weapons, and fighter LPCs associated with Nightcross Armory Heavy Support operations.

name: Nightcross Advanced Package
desc: Contains seldom-seen ship designs and weapons ostensibly belonging to the Nightcross Armory Corporation.

name: Stardust Core
desc: The weeping heart of what was once a person. Found in the cockpit of a Stargazer vessel, this computer-plus-cryopod contains unusual bio-circuitry and was once connected to a human host's nervous and circulatory system. A cadaver remains suspended in biochemical stasis beneath a faintly pulsing AI core, and attempting to separate the two results in anomalous equiment malfunctions and phenomena. The core is responsive, but uncooperative without certain measures, and cannot be used for starship command.
